page.title: 06 FREE CHURCH
page.content: { The South Nutfield Free Church }is the oldest church in Nutfield it is{ {100 }years old in{1986.}The Church was formed when two boys went to the coast but they drowned and a man saw that there was no Sunday School to teach young children what is dangerous and what is not. The{first church}was an old barn but now it is a brick building. The reason why it is called the {Free Church}is because there is no governing body. There is{no}full time Vicar. The money comes from the congregation and there are about{40} people in the congregation. Another difference is that it is open worship. Sometimes there is a joint worship with{Christ Church.
